description: Number of partitions of { 1, 2, ..., 5n } into sets of size 5.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
prog: (Sage) [rising_factorial(n+1,4*n)/120^n for n in (0..15)] # _Peter Luschny_, Jun 26 2012(MAGMA) [Factorial(5*n)/(Factorial(n)*Factorial(5)^n): n in [1..10]] // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 26 2012
author: _David W. Wilson_
